verse.name: v1
verse.lines: Who Can Cheer The Heart Like Jesus, By His Presence All Divine? True And Tender, Pure And Precious, O How Blest To Call Him Mine!

verse.name: c1
v2
verse.lines: Love Of Christ So Freely Given, Grace Of God Beyond Degree, Mercy Higher Than The Heaven, Deeper Than The Deepest Sea.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: What A Wonderful Redemption! Never Can A Mortal Know How My Sin, Though Red Like Crimson, Can Be Whiter Than The Snow.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: Every Need His Hand Supplying, Every Good In Him I See; On His Strength Divine Relying, He Is All In All To Me.

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: By The Crystal Flowing River With The Ransomed I Will Sing, And Forever And Forever Praise And Glorify The King.
